sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const Models = () => (


    Whenever possible Resilience Visitation seeks to use evidence-based models as we work with families.


    We use Mary Beyer’s{" "} {" "} Visit Coaching{""} model to facilitate most of our visits. This model includes:

  • Helping parents articulate their children's needs to be met in visits
  • Preparing parents for their children's reactions
  • Helping parents plan to give their children their full attention at each visit
  • Helping parents cope with their feelings so that they can visit consistently and keep their anger and sadness out of the visit

    • Visit Coaching is adaptable to many different situations and allows us to flexibility to meet each family’s unique needs while providing the support parents need to remain attuned to their children’s needs in extraordinarily stressful circumstances.{" "}

    {" "} We use{" "} SafeCare {" "} as a vehicle to ensure that parents of young children have basic parenting skills.

    SafeCare is a home-visiting program for families with children ages 0-5. It focuses on creating positive relationships between caregivers and their children, ensuring homes are safe to reduce the risk of child unintentional injury and keeping children as healthy as possible. SafeCare is typically completed over the course of 18 weekly sessions. Each session lasts approximately one hour.



); export default Models; //Checked
